title: Breakaway: The Road to Freedom
description: Nadia Sahari tells the remarkable, true story of her early life. Ms. Sahari was born in Beirut, Lebanon. Breakaway, her sensational journey through abuse, lifts the veil on her struggle for freedom. Until her early twenties, she was a victim of many abuses, including molestation, repeated beatings, rape, kidnapping and several attempts on her life. Miraculously she survived. Through it all she clung to her dream to be an actress. She never gave up. Her life story will bring hope and courage to abused women and children everywhere.
author: Nadia Sahari
